tool_description:
**Use the best company name cleaning API:**
- remove 2773 geographic regions in multiple languages & 384 company type suffixes
- normalize CAPS, Mixed and lowercase names
- clean unnecessary name abbreviations, special characters and phrases like 'formerly', 'of companies', 'since', 'division of' and many more
- remove slogans & short descriptions
**[See Examples in About section](/llg/api/clean-company-names-position-titles/details)**

**Clean position titles:**
- remove multi-contry geograp...
name: Clean company names & position titles
title: Clean company names & position titles

api_list.name: Clean position titles
api_list.description: Send position titles, to get them cleaned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clean-company-names-position-titles.p.rapidapi.com/clean/positionTitle"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clean-company-names-position-titles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clean-company-names-position-titles.p.rapidapi.com/clean/positionTitle"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clean-company-names-position-titles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Clean company names
api_list.description: Send company names, to get them cleaned.

optional_parameters.name: remove_regions
optional_parameters.description:
Choose how the API should handle geographic region in company name.

- **all** - remove all region information (this is the default option)
- **soft** - leave main region, remove the rest
- **no ** - do not remove regions at all
